title: The management of work centres for the handicapped
creator_credit: Michael Holmes, Francis Haveron, Heron Film Productions and United Motion Pictures
brief_description: Describes the process of management through the management committee, the work centre manager and his staff. It shows work produced by physically handicapped workers which includes packing, assembling wire products, various machine operations and handicrafts.
